Ability.Name: Rake
Ability.Lua:
local rake, _, _, _, _, _, raketimer = UnitDebuffID("target", 1822, "PLAYER")
if rake ~= nil then if raketimer - GetTime() < 4 then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(1822))) end else CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(1822))) end

Ability.Name: Rip
Ability.Lua:
local rip, _, _, _, _, _, riptimer = UnitDebuffID("target", 1079, "PLAYER") local ripCP = GetComboPoints("player", "target") local riphealth = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target")
if rip ~= nil then if riphealth > 60 then if ripCP == 5 then if riptimer - GetTime() <4 then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(1079))) end end end else if ripCP == 5 then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(1079))) end end

Ability.Name: Shred
Ability.Lua:
-- Check for the debuffs. local hasCatMangle = UnitDebuffID("target", 33876) local hasBearMangle = UnitDebuffID("target", 33878) local hasTrauma = UnitDebuffID("target", 46857) local hasHemorrhage = UnitDebuffID("target", 16511) local CP = GetComboPoints("player", "target") local target = UnitName("Target") local Fire = PQR_FireTarget("Target")
-- Just check for all buffs, we have no casting time on Shred so no need for a timer check if hasCatMangle ~= nil or hasBearMangle ~= nil or hasTrauma ~= nil or hasHemorrhage ~= nil then if PQR_NotBehindTarget() or Fire == true then return false else if CP == 5 then return false else if PQR_NotBehindTarget() == false then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(5221))) end end end end

Ability.Name: Mangle
Ability.Lua:
-- Variables local PQR_FireBleedDebuff = PQR_BleedDebuff("target") local PQR_FirePlayerBleedDebuff = PQR_PlayerBleedDebuff("target") local energyRegen = GetPowerRegen() local MangleCost = select(4,GetSpellInfo(33876)) local target = UnitName("Target") local fbCP = GetComboPoints("player", "target") local Fire = PQR_FireTarget("Target")
if MangleCost ~= 0 then local MangleRefresh = ((MangleCost/energyRegen)+2) else MangleRefresh = 3 end
if(PQR_BleedDebuff == true and PQR_PlayerBleedDebuff == false) then return false end
if(PQR_PlayerBleedDebuff == true) then local CatManTimer = select(7, UnitBuffID( "target", 33876,"player")) local BearManTimer = select(7, UnitBuffID( "target", 33878,"player")) if (CatManTimer ~= nil and (CatManTimer - GetTime() < MangleRefresh)) then return true end if (BearManTimer ~= nil and (BearManTimer - GetTime() < MangleRefresh)) then return true end else if UnitExists("target") then return true end end
if PQR_NotBehindTarget() or Fire == true and fbCP < 5 then return true end

Ability.Name: Faerie Fire (Feral)
Ability.Lua:
local FF, _, _, _, _, _, FFtimer = UnitDebuffID("target", 91565) local FFstart, FFduration, FFenabled = GetSpellCooldown(16857) local FFcooldown = (FFstart + FFduration - GetTime())
if FF == nil then if FFcooldown > 0 then return false else CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(16857))) end end

Ability.Name: Savage Roar
Ability.Lua:
local _,_,_,SavageRoar = UnitBuffID("player", 62071) local srCP = GetComboPoints("player", "target") local rip, _, _, _, _, _, riptimer = UnitDebuffID("target", 1079, "PLAYER")
if SavageRoar ~= nil then return false else if rip ~= nil then if srCP >= 5 then if riptimer - GetTime() >= 8 then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(52610))) end end end end

Ability.Name: Ferocious Bite
Ability.Lua:
local fbrip, _, _, _, _, _, fbtimer = UnitDebuffID("target", 1079, "PLAYER") local fbCP = GetComboPoints("player", "target") local fbhealth = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") local fbenergy = UnitPower("player") / UnitPowerMax("player") * 100
if fbhealth <=60 then if fbrip ~= nil then if fbCP == 5 then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(22568))) end end else if fbrip ~= nil then if fbtimer - GetTime() > 8 and fbenergy >= 60 and fbCP == 5 then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(22568))) end end end

Ability.Name: Berserk
Ability.Lua:
local _,_,_,TF = UnitBuffID("player", 5217) local _, _, _, BS = UnitBuffID("player", 50334) local BSstart, BSduration = GetSpellCooldown(50334) local BScooldown = (BSstart + BSduration - GetTime()) local bsEnergy = UnitPower("player") / UnitPowerMax("player") * 100 local bsHealth = UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") * 100 local levelcheck = UnitLevel("target")
if TF == nil then return false else if levelcheck == -1 or levelcheck >= 87 then if BScooldown > 0 then return false else -- if bsHealth < 96 then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(50334))) -- end end end end

Ability.Name: Tigers Fury
Ability.Lua:
local _,_,_,TF = UnitBuffID("player", 5217) local TFstart, TFduration = GetSpellCooldown(5217) local TFcooldown = (TFstart + TFduration - GetTime()) local tfEnergy = UnitPower("player") / UnitPowerMax("player") * 100 local stamp = UnitBuff("player", "Stampede")
if TF ~= nil then return false else if TFcooldown > 0 then return false else if stamp ~= nil then return false else if tfEnergy < 45 then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(5217))) end end end end

Ability.Name: Swipe
Ability.Lua:
local _,_,_,BS = UnitBuffID("player", 50334) local energy = UnitPower("player") / UnitPowerMax("player") * 100
if BS ~= nil then if energy >= 22 then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(62078))) end else if energy >= 45 then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(62078))) end end

Ability.Name: Ravage!
Ability.Lua:
local stamp = UnitBuff("player", "Stampede")
if stamp ~= nil then local soundState = GetCVar("Sound_EnableSFX") CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(6785))) SetCVar("Sound_EnableSFX", soundState) end

Ability.Name: --- special events ---
Ability.Lua:
-- Avoid sudden death on Ultraxion local fadingtime = select(7,UnitDebuffID("player",110070)) if fadingtime and fadingtime - GetTime() < 1.3 then RunMacroText("/click ExtraActionButton1") end
-- Avoid Hour of Twilight on Ultraxion, Delete next 3 lines if you are working as tank local channelSpell, _, _, _, _, endTime = UnitCastingInfo("boss1") if channelSpell == GetSpellInfo(109417) and endTime/1000 - GetTime() < 1.3 then RunMacroText("/click ExtraActionButton1") end
-- Try to aim on Darkmoon Faerie Cannon local canontime = select(7,UnitBuffID("player",102116)) if canontime and canontime - GetTime() < 1.15 then CancelUnitBuff("player","Magic Wings") end

Ability.Name: Mangle - Ultrax
Ability.Lua: if UnitDebuffID("Target", 33876) == true then return false else local fbenergy = UnitPower("player") / UnitPowerMax("player") * 100 local fbCP = GetComboPoints("player", "target") if fbenergy > 35 and fbCP < 5 then return true end end

Ability.Name: test
Ability.Lua: local myTable = { "Twilight Assault Drake", "Twilight Assassin", "Raider's Training Dummy", "Arm Tentacle", "Wing Tentacle", "Mutated Corruption", "Mana Void", "Elementium Bolt", "Burning Tendons", "Warmaster Blackhorn", "Goriona" } for i=1,#myTable do local target = UnitName("Target") if target == myTable[i] then print("fuz ro dah") end end
